snippet.title: Slashing Samurai trailer
snippet.description:
#gamedev #indiegame
This is a trailer for my first indie game Slashing Samurai

Slashing Samurai is a 2d roguelike survival game where you play as a Samurai who needs to protect his Grandfather and himself from waves of enemies and the longer you both survive the harder it becomes

I've been working on this game as a solo developer for 8 months and I've put my heart and soul into it. 
 
Play Slashing Samurai Now for free at:
https://oddesteagle.itch.io/slashing-samurai

My instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/oddesteagle/

My twitter:
https://twitter.com/OddestEagle

My itch.io Page:
https://oddesteagle.itch.io/

#gamedev #indiegame #gamedevelopment #indiedev #devlog
